Unable to generate PNG thumbnail of a slide with Charts inside. We are able to get textshapes, arrow shapes but not the Chart pictures in thumbnail.

text: I also need this, please resolve it as early as possible.

We're all volunteers here!

Please see http://poi.apache.org/subversion.html for details of how to get the source code of Apache POI, and http://poi.apache.org/guidelines.html for help on getting started contributing to Apache POI. You can ask on the dev list for help with adding the missing feature. Alternately, the most likely place to find people who'd be able to offer paid-for consultancy to add the feature is also the dev list - http://poi.apache.org/mailinglists.html
